original_text: The Lord sent his servants many times to warn his people. He wanted to be kind to them. He wanted to keep his temple safe.
korean_text: 그 조상들의 하나님 여호와께서 그의 백성과 그 거하시는 곳을 아끼사 부지런히 그의 사신들을 그 백성에게 보내어 이르셨으나

sentences.original_text: The Lord sent his servants many times
He wanted to be kind to them
He wanted to keep his temple safe
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 성전을 안전하게 지키고 싶었습니다
